website_summaries.verdict: A unique short-range pet tracker with a focus on its app-based community of fellow DOTT users to help search for lost pets, post warnings of local dangers (weather, wild animal sighting, etc.), and to connect with other pet owners.
pros: Impressive battery life of six to nine months between charges
DOTT is also an activity tracker that logs the duration of your dog’s walks and features a community of DOTT owners to look for missing pets
cons: The DOTT companion app is only compatible with Apple products

customer_reviews.title: Tracks activity not the pets location.
customer_reviews.text: How is this a tracker? You have to report your pet lost and enter it’s last location. I’d doesnt actually show you where your pet is on a map. Returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t track the location of your dog!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely fuming with this! My dog was on the garden and he went out the house so I was going to track him down with the GPS and I realised that the one who tracked it was me! Gosh I spent so much on this virtual dog tag to realise that when I needed it the most it was terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Noelia G.

customer_reviews.title: Only supported by Apple products
customer_reviews.text: Once I unboxed the item and got the manual online I had seen that it's only supported with apple products, this should have been more prominently displayed before purchasing. Unfortunately I have to return this item since I have a Galaxy Note.
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: Just received my package with this smart dog tag and as I opened it it looked ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my package with this smart dog tag and as I opened it it looked as if it was chewed up and broken.
customer_reviews.author: Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Not a GPS tracker
customer_reviews.text: The tag works a bit differently than what I expected. Basically it depends on proximity to track your pet. The device, when paired with a smart phone gives you in and out of range alerts. It doesn’t pinpoint the exact location of your pet, just notifies you when your pet is within a certain range. However, it's still is what I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G.

customer_reviews.title: Broke apart the first time using. It was on ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke apart the first time using. It was on my dog's collar and we went for a walk. When we got home 15 mins later, I noticed the device broke in half. The battery and the other half of the tag were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had trouble pairing. But eventually got it to work
customer_reviews.text: I almost returned this product. Wouldn't pair. Bought a new battery. That wouldn't pair. The instruction manual is online and is sparse. You'd do better to search YouTube. Ultimately, if it won't pair, take the battery out - delete your app - redownload the app, start over pairing. It did eventually pair. The "locator" isn't fabulous. Accurate to around a house or two. (Using this for a cat. I think it would be better for a dog). But it does seem to track his progress. I'll update the review after using for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Ravele

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for families
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I purchased these, one for each of my dogs. We were initially confused when trying to share caretaking of both our pets, but could only activate one account each. Eventually, we contacted customer support and they were great and very fast to respond. Once they walked us through the process, step-by-step, we were able to synchronize all the caretakers and all our pets in the family. It’s a caretaker invitation code that will expire in a few days. If the other caretaker did not activate it, you have to create a new one. It seems the system is quite secure in protecting our information.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Williams

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: App is not functional and shuts down constantly. I was also unable to track my dog's location using the tag, instead the app only shows the GPS location of my phone. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: A. Luu

customer_reviews.title: Not puppy friendly
customer_reviews.text: Durability of this product is not the finest. I've had it for about a week and it was on my puppy's collar and she bit it and it stopped working. And I Changed the battery and it doesn't work anymore.. I contacted customer service and told them and they were able to send me out a new one which made me happy and hopefully it works for a longer period of time. They should make it stronger durability for puppies or dogs
customer_reviews.author: joanna

customer_reviews.title: Protect your pets!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product so far. It is about the size of a quarter, lightweight, and attaches easily to the collar. The tag connects to an app on my iPhone called "DOTTwalk" which was easy to download and setup. My dog is small, about 15lbs, and I didn't want some big heavy object that would bother him or make him want to bite it. This is perfect in that regard. My neighborhood has a lot of pets, and I've seen too many lost pet posters. I hope to never lose my dog, but at least this will help locate him if it ever does happen.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Light and durable
customer_reviews.text: The tag weighs only 7 grams, tells you when your lost (or hiding) pet is nearby. It's water resistant, works well outdoors, we haven’t tested just how large the coverage area is but even when Tucker is out of sight, it’s nice to know that he’s closeby and we can find him if anything happens.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Not powerful enough to track my dog as he moved from room to room. I wish there was a cell tower GPS product which did not require a monthly or yearly fee. My credit card was promptly credited a refund from Amazon the moment the package was scanned for return.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R.

customer_reviews.title: if you have more than one pup/fur baby and they like to chew beware.
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this virtual leash is everything it says it is I just never got the chance to try it. I bought one of these for one pup to see if it would do as described It arrived late in the afternoon I put the DOTT on my pup did the download to my phone and it seemed to work so I called it a night and went to bed. Come morning I let them run and it did not work ONLY because the other pup chewed this DOTT all to pieces...end of DOTT end of story.
customer_reviews.author: WeSeyDogs

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this it didn’t work, ordered a replacement, also didn’t work so stuck with a 39.99 piece of junk . I bought a Pawscout and it works great . I was in middle of moving so wasn’t able to send it back with moving chaos by time I found it window closed . Glad I didn’t lose my dog counting on this . And manufacturing of it ignores my messages to replace it . Don’t recommend this product , however amazon is refunding my return because Amazon is awesome .I will use it to buy a pawscout for my new puppy .
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Stress Free
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest thing ever. I get so nervous because my Bengal always tries to go outside. Now if it does happen I can find him <3
customer_reviews.author: MDH

customer_reviews.title: Decent Tracking, easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: So far I've encountered no problems with the device. It was easy to set up and the shipping was fast. Obviously, the tracker works best in densely populated areas, but even out here in woods, my phone is able to pick up the signal from my dogs from 200-300 feet off from where the dog is actually is. To me, this isn't so bad as I can usually find her within that distance pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Corroded battery in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I missed the return cutoff for this item due to the holiday weekend. It works as others have said. Basically a Tile with pet-specific software. It doesn't make a sound to help you find it though and the user network is non-existent. The tracker stopped working after 2-3 weeks and when I pulled it apart to change the battery found the entire inside corroded. New battery didn't make it work again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this tag to find my dog when he ran off. We were able to drive up the street and we got a ping on his approximate location so we started looking around there and found him in the nearby woods. I never would have known where to start looking without it! The app makes care taking with multiple people a breeze and the walk feature is really great. The best part is the virtual fence so I know if he gets too far away again (I forgot to put the virtual fence on when he ran off). Wonderful pet parent gift! Great product and amazing customer support!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Not for long distance tracking
customer_reviews.text: I got this to track my dog when he wanders - which he does a lot. It has an okay range for when he’s two houses away, but any further than that - it doesn’t find him. My big complaint is the battery life. I got this February 16th and the battery died last week and can’t track him. Of course there are worse things but the last time he ran off, the DOTT couldn’t track him. If I didn’t pay $40 I wouldn’t be as angry about the battery, but I expected the battery to last a couple of months and not die after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: The iOS app is unusable in October of 2018.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my Mother who has 2 dogs back in May 2018. She was unable to get the app to work with the devices and asked me this weekend to assist when I was visiting. After a frustrating and long period of time attempting to get it to work this product went in the trash can since the return window has closed. I found that some areas of the app were partially offscreen, including the area where you pair the tag/device, so I could not make use of the features.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Only purchase if you know other DOTT app users in your area!
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this product would be great if you lived in an area where there are lots of DOTT app users, but I do not. I did not completely understand that this would be required to help locate my dog when he got out when I initially ordered the product, and found out the hard way. I plan to return this for something with continuous GPS even if I have to pay for a subscription to something. This did nothing to help locate my dog when he wandered out of the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item about 6 months ago. At first time I tried connecting this item, it didn't connect. I tried again the second time with a little harder press and it worked. I like the fact that I can track where my dog is roaming around. Very useful when walking in the parks. I plan to buy another one when I get another dog.
customer_reviews.author: D. Do

customer_reviews.title: There app to install to phones doesn't work because all you get when trying is a plank screen.
customer_reviews.text: couldn't download the manual ,also the app couldn't be installed on our phones. I even took it to a phone store and they could not install it either.They are made in China , if you need to return a item ,China won't pay for shipping. I's on you...Been there and done that!!!!! Won't buy from China again....
customer_reviews.author: MarloSD

customer_reviews.title: Barely works
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to connect. Hard to keep connected and barley shows a location. It only gives you a vicinity and makes no sound to let you now were in a lets a say room it is. I bought it so I could find my daughters cat when it excepted and when it hid in the house. Neither worked. It never worked outside other than to say the cat was outside.
customer_reviews.author: TB03830

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy
customer_reviews.text: I received the package in perfect condition however I really had difficulty to understand the function of it .Apparently if your dog is lost ,the people who have the same dog tag may help you find it as it catches the signal that your dog's tag gives out ,so it is not a tracker as we know it at all .For me it was a waste of money ...
customer_reviews.author: Ozlem Altinok

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Device
customer_reviews.text: This product is something that I have been looking for for quite a long time. Love the product. I put one of these on Lexie's collar for peace of mind. Looks amazing. App is fun. Product works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont waist your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 of them. Most we couldn't get it to sync up. We sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie L Pusceddu

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how limited this product was..not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Dianne heard

customer_reviews.title: perfect purchasing experience!
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping, beautiful packaging I bought this for my collegue's birthday. she is difficult to shop for, but I wanted to get something practical for her dog, and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Someone told me about this product. It is a very good concept, especially when there are other users in your area. Purchased this as a gift for my friend. She recently got a terrier mix who isn't chipped yet! She was thrilled when she received the DOTT and downloaded the app to test it out. It worked! She is very excited about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Too much trouble to be useful for me
customer_reviews.text: This item has many good ideas and is in its infancy. I was so excited to become part of their community to help me find my pet and help others find theirs too. However, I am returning it until they work the bugs out. It mostly posts the wrong address. I could not get it to be accurate after many tries. I disconnected it re-connected it still wrong address. Even when it was on my property. It disconnects a lot on its own too. Too much trouble to be useful for me. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Georgana Romano

customer_reviews.title: App not available to download
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the DOTT as we are going away with my dog and wanted extra protection . I am trying to download the app but it says it is not available In my country/area . I contacted customer services and they immediately answered and were able to correct. The DOTT is working great for me so far
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Gerhard

customer_reviews.title: great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with Dott customer service and they have been incredibly accommodating and responsive! I appreciate that so much these days! This is a great product for any dog owner to help protect their pet and the app is equally impressive if you have multiple caregivers taking care of your dog! Perri
customer_reviews.author: Joe Barra

customer_reviews.title: Battery black hole
customer_reviews.text: This DEVOURS batteries. We have to get a new one every other week! And the collar won’t hold blu tooth connection at all. The app does more tracking than the collar. I’d have better luck tracking the dog by giving him a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jenae

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I PUT THIS ON MY LAB 5 WEEKS AGO AFTER HE WANDERED FOR 7 HOURS WITHOUT ME OR METRO FINDING HIM SCARY! HE HASN'T ESCAPED AGAIN BUT IT MAKES ME NOT WORRY . I TOOK HIM CAMPING IT SHOWED ME WHERE HE WAS I'M WONDERING HOW LONG THE BATTERY WILL WORK IS MY ONLY CONCERN
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA  CHINN

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough about DOTT! It's very simple to use. I followed the instructions on the box to download the app. Put my pet's profile information in my phone, and connect the devices. My phone found the DOTT right away. The packaging and the device are so cute and looks great. It's a great concept.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The app is so easy to use. There is a customer service submission page and I received a helpful answer in less than a day. I love that I can share the app with our dog walker. Our rescue dog is a runner, and although we're very careful - we always worry especially when someone else is watching her. We have not had to use the GPS feature yet, but it gives us peace of mind knowing she's wearing DOTT.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dacey

customer_reviews.title: Cat-Approved
customer_reviews.text: Love my DOTT. It is easy to set up, lightweight, unobtrusive. At first I was afraid my cat wouldn't like wearing something on her collar, but in the end it wasn't a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: PK Singh

customer_reviews.title: Accurate/good price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's pretty accurate when I look for my cat. He hasn't been missing for me to confirm that it completely works but around the yard it has worked...my yard is 3acres.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not work in the US. You cannot connect to your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Fry

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: This device did not work. Constant issues connecting, despite having a strong wi-fi service. Virtual leash option never worked or alerted me.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Must have bluetooth and location on at all times to be accurate
customer_reviews.text: If u want to track ur animal acuratly u have to keep bluetooth on all the time which waste phone battery alot. But it give u a relative location of the animal which is nics.
customer_reviews.author: Shabster626

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Not what we wanted at all. It couldn’t even detect our dog a few houses away when husband took dog on walk. A waste of $$.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Such a neat concept.
customer_reviews.text: attached this little tag to my dog collar and let him walk around with the virtual leash. The app keeps track of everything about him, feeding, walk and treat. When I get far enough away from him there is a notification that he is out of range then it will allow you to report him lost.
customer_reviews.author: laurence

customer_reviews.title: Not a TRUE GPS. Misleading info in description and function.
customer_reviews.text: This is a glorified Bluetooth locator that only works in the immediate vicinity of your pet. Not GPS DEVICE. That’s all I need to say except the promotion and packaging are misleading. Has been RETURNED.
customer_reviews.author: K Day / Atlanta, Ga

customer_reviews.title: You might need to return
customer_reviews.text: Item works for a bit and the it simply doesn’t , it tracks but you have to be really close. Not the most user friendly app, I had to return multiple times as the badge kept not working with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: ds

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Doesn’t always find the dog until I’m standing right next to her.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Bandelin

customer_reviews.title: Safety /Fires hazard
customer_reviews.text: It short circuited , burned up, and spooked my dog.
customer_reviews.author: SING Y POON

customer_reviews.title: Very very poor range
customer_reviews.text: This has a very poor range. It loses connection at about 10 feet away and can’t connect if there’s even a small obstruction in the way. If i stand 5 feet away from the tag and put my hand in front of my phone it loses connection. waste of $40
customer_reviews.author: Hubbsangel

customer_reviews.title: Range issues
customer_reviews.text: Range is deceptive. Range appropriate if you are near your missing dog. If not, lacks use.
customer_reviews.author: Tanicia

customer_reviews.title: Not GPS
customer_reviews.text: but it gets the job done. We didn’t want to pay a subscription so this is a good alternative
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT HELP FIND DOG
customer_reviews.text: We live outside the city and when he did go missing the app just let me mark him as lost and did not show me which direction he went or send a Bluetooth signal at all. Worthless and not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Great Experiences. User-friendly product.
customer_reviews.text: It's so cool. I purchased this for my dog.I have put it on its collar. It is very user friendly and easy to set up. It is light and water resistant. The GPS tracker is quite accurate. The dog lovers will definitely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Lau

customer_reviews.title: Great but you cant be far away
customer_reviews.text: Wish this had a longer range. but for the size and price its better than nothing. not too mention no monthly service fee.
customer_reviews.author: Lollypupgirl

customer_reviews.title: Less coverage than claimed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it claimed that the signal coverage is about 85 basketballs yard. Once I try to find out what's exactly, it likes standard bluetooth item which about 10-20 meters away. Feel upset now.
customer_reviews.author: Chonnapan

customer_reviews.title: Too large for small breeds
customer_reviews.text: The device itself works great and the app is very user friendly, but it is not suitable for very small breeds. I have a 5 lb. Yorkie and the tag is so large that my dog could get it in his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: lisalynn

customer_reviews.title: The dog finder feature is what I like best
customer_reviews.text: The dog finder feature is what I like best. We cannot stop our dogs from roaming around at times so the dog finder features helps me in tracking my dog's whereabouts at times like that.
customer_reviews.author: Eula

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog dott only tell where I am because I am holding the phone.
customer_reviews.author: roslyn mccarty

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about 6 months before the battery went dead. The package comes with a replacement but I lost it, so I had to buy a new
customer_reviews.author: shekchungyan

customer_reviews.title: Love the walk application
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I ended up purchasing this tag! I love that I can track my walks with my bulldog, Chuck. He met a new friend in the dog park through the app. And I'm checking the app every day and see whether his best friend is on a walk ;) When it comes to the tag itself, I think the tag is pretty user-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Ben kage

customer_reviews.title: Not a pet finder!!
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I should have read the reviews a little better on this product. This is not a GPS tracker. I was hoping to be able to see where the DOTT was on the map, but instead it shows where my phone (with the app) is. This is ridiculous. You can download Map My Walk and get the same thing this tag offers, but for free. I highly recommend getting a different product if your intent is to be able to find a lost pet.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Wytaske

customer_reviews.title: It is not a perfect product, but it is reliable for the most ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not a perfect product, but it is reliable for the most part. I was able to pair the device pretty easily and pick up the signal right away.. Glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: svlc

customer_reviews.title: Such a breeze having this.
customer_reviews.text: I could keep my dog fit and healthy by being able to monitor my dog's activities and progress each day. Such a breeze having this.
customer_reviews.author: Rosette

customer_reviews.title: Set up.failed 3 x
customer_reviews.text: Could not even get it set up. Going back. Too bad cuz I liked the idea
customer_reviews.author: laurie rando

customer_reviews.title: The tag came in really cute packaging and was easy to set up with the app
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Bengal cat Cheesy because she's not microchipped. The tag came in really cute packaging and was easy to set up with the app. Cheesy's a really active cat, so I like that the tag is really light and doesn't interfere with her playing.
customer_reviews.author: Peggie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Horrible doesn’t even work didn’t even pick up tracker of my cat when he would get out
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Piccone

customer_reviews.title: Great device, especially when your pet is an escape artist
customer_reviews.text: It works as it promised. Cute design, a bit confusing the pair the tag, but I feel relieved now that I have a way to locate my dog if he ever gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: YMN

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Never worked, very first negative review I’ve posted. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: my dog chewed it up the first day didn't have a chance to try it out
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Intuitive, smart design, and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Dott smart dog tag is easy to use, operation is intuitive, and has a very ergonomic design. The app interface is professionally designed and hassle-free. We were very excited to try this product and so far everything about it lives up to expectations. We can see great potential for this product as the community gains traction and locating our pet, if god forbid she ever gets lost, will be easier
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chan

customer_reviews.title: I returned this item. It did not mention that ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. It did not mention that you had to have an iPhone to use it. I have an Android. That should definitely be in the description VERY CLEARLY.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hubby

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It tells me where I am more than it’s ever tracked my animal.

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my time and now I have to return it
customer_reviews.text: Only works with iPhones. That's a BIG detail to leave out in your description. Wasted my time and now I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rohr

customer_reviews.title: Not a real GPS
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all. This "GPS" did not track my dogs at all. I have dogs that like to run and I wanted to be able to tell where they are at. This does not allow me to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan L. Roe

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and light
customer_reviews.text: These tags are super cute! I bought one for my cat and it’s not too heavy to attach to her collar. We have purchased other tags before but they were too heavy and she would just freeze in place. We’re very happy with the tag!

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Not adequately durable for even a small dog
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Not adequately durable for even a small dog. He managed to take one chomp on it and destroy it. It lasted about an hour. Wrote company. Not response.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The first two days at work fine at that I broke
customer_reviews.author: mike basile

customer_reviews.title: cool device!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great locator tracker for use on any type of dog...a beautifully smart dog tag that brings peace of mind. One of my biggest fear is losing my dog so this is perfect to keep him. Thanks for this Device !!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This device was very easy to pair to my smartphone and get it working. My pup is still small, and it just makes me feel so much better being able to find him if he was to get away. Great product I am so excited to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's durable and that I  feel at peace on my dog's safety.
customer_reviews.text: The thing about this leash is that aside from its durability and performance, I love how I'm getting my mind at peace because my dog's safety is doubled with this. I've never had issue with it to date.

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product. I love it so much for my puppy.
customer_reviews.text: This is like GPS minus the size and price. They're very small and the battery seems to last long. I badly need one for my naughty pup and I'm glad that it's working very well.

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: The cat usually doesn't leave the house, but we use it as a failsafe in case she gets out of the house without us knowing.

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves it! She's more tech savvy that I am! So she gets a lot use out of the app

customer_reviews.title: Great app update!
customer_reviews.text: The new "Find my pet" feature released in the last update is really useful to know where your pet is at all times

customer_reviews.title: life saver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, sync to my phone, and involve my whole family when we go out with our dog.

product_meta.title: DOTT The Smart Dog Tag - Bluetooth Tracker for Dogs and Cats, Pet Finder, Virtual Leash, No Subscription (NOT A GPS Tracker)
product_meta.description:
The all-in-one pet protection solution that maximizes the chances of finding lost pets.

DOTT works 4X better than a microchip and enables owners to proactively search for their pet in the event it goes missing. Unlike traditional GPS trackers which can be power hungry, require a monthly subscription and charging every 1-3 days. DOTT is not a GPS tracker and it does not contain a battery-consuming GPS chip.

If your pet is lost, 3 simple steps to increase chances of finding your pet:

1) Report your pet lost - DOTTpet’s in-app autotracking will be enabled, allowing the app to continuously scan for the signal of the DOTT tag. An in-app poster will be generated and show up on the map of all the users in the area. We will also advertise the lost pet poster and do targeted social media sharing in your neighborhood to recruit more helpers.

2) Walk or drive around to detect the DOTT tag signal - Every person who has the app can contribute a coverage of 85-standard basketball courts. Signals can be picked up even the phone or iPad is in a fast moving vehicle. The "Find Pet" feature provides DOTT tag owners with a way to check if their pet is nearby. The long battery life enables the tag to continuously emit a signal for up to 6 months.

3) Find more helpers - Users can expand their search network by inviting their friends and neighbors to aid in the search, allowing the search party to cover a lot of ground quickly



The DOTTpet app is also designed to simplify daily pet care:

-Keep track of your pet’s daily walks, food intake, potty breaks, treats, medication & more

-Track the duration and distance of walks to ensure your pet gets enough exercise

-Share pet care responsibilities with caretakers and keep your pet's schedule intact



Compatible with iOS device (iOS 9.3 or above)

Important note: Android Beta is now available & DOTT is NOT a GPS tracker
